description: This file defines the NotesService class that provides CRUD operations for notes, interfacing with a backend API. It uses Angular's dependency injection and HTTP client modules, along with an authentication service to handle authorized requests.

classes.name: NotesService
classes.description: Service class providing methods to list, get, create, update, and delete notes for the user.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Fetches all notes for the current user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a single note by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note with the provided payload.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by noteId with new data.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Deletes a note specified by noteId.
